page.title: 14PLAYGROUND GAMES (3)
page.content: {WHEN SUSIE WAS A BABY} You play it in pairs with any number of children. You hold one hand down and one hand up. Then you clap hands with your friend. Then you clap hands yourself. {When Susie was a baby, { A baby Susie was. She went { gag gag gag gag gag. When Susie was a school girl, A school girl Susie was and she went Miss, Miss I can't do this, Sir, Sir I can't do that. { When Susie was a teenager, { A teenager Susie was, and she went { Oh! Ah! I lost my bra, { I lost my knickers in my { boyfriend's car When Susie was a mother A mother Susie was, and she went scrub, scrub, scrub, scrub, scrub.
